document.full_text: it was not back to business as usual around the nfl on tuesday despite a federal judge siding with players this week and granting their request for a preliminary injunction to lift the lockout.
document.title: nfl players not allowed to train despite lifting of lockout
lines_and_colors: it was not back to business as usual around the nfl on tuesday despite a federal judge siding with players this week and granting their request for a preliminary injunction to lift the lockout.
